A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a brilliant continuation of the Star Wars franchise. Not quite as good as the force awakens but it definitely holds its own in the series. I would say the last 20 minutes outshine the rest\, and unfortunately a lot of the movie is spent on a B plot which turn out to be a futile effort which is a little disatisfying but worth the watch and very enjoyable\, regardless.
